price: 66. Waarlijk, zij zullen daarvan eten en hun buiken ermee vullen.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
